Another Sample Post
This is another sample post, just to test if all functionalities are running
successfully.

Please do note that NCRYPTO is still in alpha stage.

Here are some key points to verify:

 * Stay at home
 * Stay away from those kids
 * Don't do drugs, ever!

If all the aforementioned points are being successfully followed by you then
congrats!
